SAT 27 MAR 2010

Our expert's view of the main contenders and likely winner of the race. Part of RACINGPOST.com Members' Club

The market has often got this right in recent years and PENITENT, who has conditions to suit and has more to offer this year, can justify his position at the head of the betting and give his trainer a third success in this race. Tiger Reigns and Prime Exhibit are feared most.
